column5: Hi, My sister-in-law just bought a place in Turkey Point and I would like to do some fishing next time I am there. Any suggestions? Perch would be a good start if they are around that area.  Thanks in advance!  Mark

If the weather permits head east to Normandale it's not very far perch are usually in the weedbeds out from the small pier there in 10-15 fow best to go with a offshore wind though it is the outter bay and can get nasty quick
I have had good days catching perch in and around pier area in the past. It's hit & miss though.
